title: L2Q2 Unicode
description: Write a program to read one character from keyboard and the program then prints out its Unicode in hexadecimal form.
example:
For example:

Enter a character: a
The Unicode is: u0061

Hint: To print out a hexadecimal number 0xxx, use the "04x" pattern.
defaultCode:
x = input("Enter a character: ")
print("The Unicode is: u%04x" % ord(x))
